overview.en: bzc is a new game platform based on blockchain technology. It perfectly displays the technical attributes of the blockchain, and displays the blockchain game in front of the public with a new form, starting the combination of blockchain and game.
overview.zh: bzc是基于区块链技术发展出的全新游戏平台，它将区块链技术属性完美的展现出来，用全新的形态把区块链游戏展现在大众面前，开始区块链与游戏的结合。
